caseTitle: Abdul Wahab & others v. H.B.L. & others
tagline: The nature of relationship between the petitioners i.e. employees of Habib Bank Limited (HBL) and the respondent i.e. HBL was contractual. The impugned orders of compulsory retirement of the petitioners were in accord with the Habib Bank Limited (Staff) Service Rules, 1981 which are non-statutory. HBL is not performing any function in connection with the affairs of the Federation or a Province. No question of public importance with reference to enforcement of fundamental rights has been raised. The  grievances  voiced  through  this  petition  are  individual in nature. The petition having no merits is accordingly dismissed.
